body.name: HaFundy LED Desk Lamp for Home,Office,Reading,Adjustable Eye-Caring Desk Light with Clamp,Swing Arm Lamp Includes 3 Color Modes,10 Brightness Levels Table Lamps with Memory Function(Black) (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 35 mins
features: ❤【3 COLOR LIGHT AND 10-WAY DIMMABLE】- The desk lamp is the latest version, which has 3 kinds of light (including white light, daylight, and warm light). The brightness (10 levels)of each color light can also be adjusted gradually according to the button indication, You can choose the most comfortable light to control the appearance and feel of your space (such as working, reading, or relaxing).

❤【HIGHLY ADJUSTABLE LAMP AND SAVING SPACE】- The desk lamp for home comes with a 360° rotating light, 270°rotating base,180° adjustable metal arm. You can adjust the light direction as you like.And the flexible adjusting arm can be extended up to 29 inches and used in multiple locations.The reading light is also equipped with a sturdy clamp that can support a tabletop up to 2 inches.Suitable for reading working,computer boards, jewelry makers,arts crafts hobbyists,welding,nail salon.

❤【EYE PROTECTION LAMP】- The desk lamp has been professionally designed, with no strobe, no ghosting, no shadow, which keeps you focused and productive when you're working, reading, or studying. Its light is very uniform, can prevent blue light damage to the eyes. This lamp is suitable for all ages, no matter the children or grandparents, easily protect your family's eyes.

❤【ALUMINUM HEAT DISSIPATION ENERGY SAVING】- Compared with other ordinary desk lamps, this desk lamp adopts the newest grade aluminum alloy structure as the heat sink, which provides sufficient 14W's brightness, is more energy-efficient and has a longer service life, without frequent replacement, and reduces electricity cost and carbon footprint.

❤【VARIOUS CHARGING METHODS AND MEMORY FUNCTION】- The LED desk lamp is equipped with a USB cable and 5V/2A (DC) adapter which is safer and more reliable than other adapters, it will reach the highest brightness and the longest service life. You can also supply the power to the desk lamp through laptop, computers USB ports, power banks. Our architectural lights also support power-off memory. When you turn off the lights and turn on the power again, the lamp will return to the previous setting.
body.description: Desk lamp with clamp High Color Rendering Index Ability CRI is an important parameter for the color characteristics of a light source. The higher the CRI, the better the color rendering of the light source. A light source with a CRI of 80 or higher has a stronger ability to restore the color of the object.(Our desk lamp color Rendering Index:>80Ra) Switch Type: On/Off Switch Color Temperature:3000/4500/6000k Luminous Flux:880Lm Voltage: DC 5V/2A Wattage: 14W Bulb Lifespan: 35000h Material: ABS+Metal Total Product weight: 800g

Eye Protection Our LED desk lamp protects people's eyes who work and reading a long time from hurt, nonflickering. No glare, No ultraviolet ray, No frequency radiation.

3 Color Temperature Switchable and 10-Level Dimmable Touch Control Desk Lamp. The desk lamp provides 3 color modes (3000K to 6000K) from warm white to cold white.You can also adjust the 10 brightness levels to convenient your life.

Double Metal Our desk lamp' long arm is made of high-quality metal, which is very strong. And it is painted with black powder coating to prevent rust and fall off, making the desk light more durable. High-quality Lampshade Our dek lamp is made of aluminum, which improves the heat dissipation effect of the desk lights ​and makes it has a longer last life. USB Powered & Switches Control Our desk lamp can be powered by USB, you can power it with your computer, laptop, portable battery. It provides 14W enough brightness while consume less energy than conventional bulbs.

Folding and Save Space& Angle Adjustment Our LED desk lamps with clamp supports up to 2 inches desktop and holds the desk light securely. It's easy to adjust angle according to your needs. Foldable and compact design saving space.

Our desk light is used perfectly in many scenarios. It is suitable for reading working in home office, and can be used as study table lamp, drafting table lamp, craft lamp, nail table lamp,office light,night light...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LED Desk Lamp for Home
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. Just what I needed for a small area to do my paintings (at night). Clamps to any flat surface. Love the settings on light, also can change to bright or soft light. Value for my $$$.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Bright - SHOrT Cable
reviews.reviewText: This works great and is very bright. The arm holds it's position well. The included cable is shockingly short - so unless you're plugging it in 1.5 feet away you'll need another cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Illuminate Your Workspace with Precision - HaFundy LED Desk Lamp Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my workspace with the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp, and it has proven to be a game-changer for my home office. This adjustable desk light with a clamp not only provides versatile illumination but also prioritizes eye comfort during extended work or reading sessions. Here's why the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp deserves a spot on your desk.Adjustable and Precise Lighting (5/5):The standout feature of the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp is its adjustable lighting options. The lamp offers a range of brightness levels and color temperatures, allowing me to customize the illumination to suit different tasks and preferences. The precise control over lighting makes it an ideal companion for detailed work or focused reading.Eye-Caring Design (5/5):One of the key highlights is the lamp's eye-caring design. The LED technology used in this desk lamp mimics natural light, reducing eye strain and fatigue during prolonged use. The flicker-free lighting ensures a comfortable and stress-free experience, making it suitable for extended work hours.Space-Saving Clamp Design (5/5):The inclusion of a clamp is a space-saving genius. The HaFundy LED Desk Lamp can be securely attached to the edge of my desk, freeing up valuable space on the surface. The clamp is sturdy and provides a stable grip, ensuring that the lamp stays in place even when adjusting the angle of the light.Adjustable Arm and Head (5/5):The lamp's flexible design extends to its adjustable arm and head. I can easily position the light exactly where I need it, whether it's focused on my work documents, keyboard, or reading material. The flexibility adds to the lamp's versatility, catering to different lighting needs.Modern Aesthetic (5/5):Beyond functionality, the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp adds a modern and sleek touch to my workspace. The minimalist design with clean lines and a contemporary finish complements the overall aesthetic of my home office. It's both a functional tool and a stylish addition to my desk.Energy-Efficient LED Technology (5/5):The LED technology incorporated in this desk lamp is not only eye-friendly but also energy-efficient. The lamp provides ample illumination while consuming less energy compared to traditional lighting sources. It's a conscious choice for both comfort and sustainability.Touch Controls with Memory Function (5/5):The touch controls are intuitive and responsive. Adjusting brightness and color temperature is as simple as a touch. The memory function is a convenient feature, allowing the lamp to remember the last settings used. It's a time-saving detail that enhances the overall user experience.Quality Build and Durability (5/5):The HaFundy LED Desk Lamp boasts a quality build and durability. The materials used feel robust and capable of withstanding regular adjustments and everyday use. The solid construction instills confidence in the lamp's longevity, making it a reliable addition to my workspace.Affordable Lighting Upgrade (5/5):Considering the adjustable and precise lighting, eye-caring design, space-saving clamp, flexible arm and head, modern aesthetic, energy-efficient LED technology, touch controls with memory function, quality build, and durability, the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp is an affordable lighting upgrade for any home office or reading nook. The value it brings to my workspace is well worth the investment.Conclusion:In conclusion, the HaFundy LED Desk Lamp has elevated my workspace lighting to new heights. With its adjustable and precise lighting, eye-caring design, space-saving clamp, flexible arm and head, modern aesthetic, energy-efficient LED technology, touch controls with memory function, quality build, and affordability, this desk lamp delivers on both functionality and style. Highly recommended for those seeking an efficient and eye-friendly lighting solution for their workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best desktop light out there. Easy to use, sturdy, easy to position most anyway and sufficiently bright but can be dimmed. Might by another

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed for model painting!
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this purchase. It isn't the brightest light or the most robust but for the price it is exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved it until….
reviews.reviewText: Loved it until it overheated. It is a great light but it overheats and turns itself off. Usually after about 30 minutes then I have to let it cool down completely to get it to work properly again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good brightness. Arm makes positioning flexible enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, flexible, versatile.
reviews.reviewText: I love the shape of the light, i love how flexible and stable the lamp is with 3 different light settings and a number of brightness settings. Easy setup and very versatile to use.

O produto é muito bom e atendeu perfeitamente as minhas expectativas... só tive um probleminha com o adaptador (5V/2A) que não está funcionando, quando uso ele a Luz somente pisca e não acende. Troquei-o por um outro que eu já tenho aqui e funcionou perfeitamente.

reviews.reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY. The light turns off after a few seconds of it being on.
reviews.reviewText: The light switches off a few seconds after it is turned on right from the box. Also the remote control is inconveniently placed really close to the lamp which makes it unideal if placing the lamp at a far corner on a desk.
A luminária é muito boa, o cachimbo de ligar ela veio danificado,Acho que na base de peso, deveria vir com uma ventosas pra ajudar a fixar na mesa, de resto aparelho top

Me parecio un producto perfecto, supero mis expectativas, el diseño es muy ergonomico por lo que no estorba para nada y la iluminacion es perfecta, incluso los niveles de iluminosidad me parecieron espectaculares
